dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for training and evaluating the proposed ARShadowGAN, containing 3,000 quintuples with synthetic AR images, virtual object masks, labeled real-world shadow matting, and corresponding labeled occluders.
dcterms:title: Shadow-AR dataset
